title: Messages unacknowledged rate is higher than usual on: {{host.name}}
description: Notify your team when a RabbitMQ message unacknowledged rate is higher than usual.

definition.name: [RabbitMQ] Messages unacknowledged rate is higher than usual on: {{host.name}}
definition.query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:rabbitmq.queue.messages_unacknowledged.rate{*} by {rabbitmq_queue,host}, 'agile', 2, direction='above', alert_window='last_15m', interval=60, count_default_zero='true', seasonality='hourly') >= 1
